eu_initiatives: We will be following initiatives related to renewable energy, energy efficiency, energy demand, energy supply and community energy
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
relevant_communication: Key area of activity will be following EU initiatives, policies and legislative files that may impact on community energy organisations in the UK and communicating key issues and impacts to our members
legal_status: Company limited by guarantee (not for profit)
goals__remit: Community Energy England was established in 2014 as a not for profit organisation, set up to provide a voice for the community energy sector and help create the conditions within which community energy can flourish.
